description:
Slide these over layers when the wind picks up or the temperature drops. The microfiber outer layer is wind and water-resistant. the mesh inner layer moves moisture for comfort during all day activities.

  • 4-way microfibre stretch outer layer for easy mobility
  • Outer surface has Bionic Finish Eco® (a natural fluorine – free hydrophobic finish)
  • Mesh interior surface for breathability and comfort
  • Elastic waistband (with drawstring)
  • Front pocket with YKK® zipper
  • YKK ¾ zipper on lower leg lets you pull them on over your or hiking boots
  • Cuffs with silicone grip to keep everything in place
name: B Daehlie Winner 3.0 Pants - Men's
